title: Bungalow for Sale
details:
Bungalow for Sale. Rs 46 Million (Negotiable)

Location- School lane, pupuressa road, Galaha.

240 perches total land
6 bed rooms
4 wash rooms
Separate Garage with Remote gate
Main entrance with Remote Gate
Teak wooden floor
Servant room
Servant wash room
Fully equipped Kitchen
2 water tanks 2000 liters each
Rooftop
Well water also available with motor
